title: The Midnight Special
description: Her students looked like little angels, and Maggie Linden was thrilled to be tutoring the four nephews of renowned journalist Nick Brannon. Her enthusiasm was just slightly dimmed when she learned her new charges had already sent fourteen teachers packing! Maggie was determined to prevail even against mice in her suitcase and snakes in her bed! But Nick Brannon knew how to rattle her as no one else could... with provocative whispers and sizzling embraces that stirred up all her emotions. Maggie wanted Nick, and tried to hold him close to her heart, but Nick's career beckoned him to dangers Maggie couldn't share.
author: Sara Orwig
